metadata.name: Le spose di Max
metadata.description: Marco Schifano creates this evocative picture as subtle divergence between truth and fantasy, concreteness and suggestion. This item describes the essence of the empirical and dreamlike beauty. It is a subtle play between lights and shadows, emotional empathy and realization, a combination made of balance, capable of taking you by hand into a parallel world. Schifano brings his photographic mastery to the NFT world and decides to do it though an astounding shot: an equation between delicacy and elegance in a perfect chromatic mixture.
